actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to remove the requirement of 5 years of employee service immediately before retirement for an annuitant to be eligible to continue health benefits coverage after retirement.

summary.text: Terminates the requirement of five years of Federal employee service immediately before retirement for an annuitant to be eligible to continue health benefits coverage after retirement. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8905(b)(1)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to remove the requirement of 5 years of employee service immediately before retirement for an annuitant to be eligible to continue health benefits coverage after retirement.
